title: Mod Manifest Schema
description: Defines the structure of a mod.manifest.json file for the Living Narrative Engine.

$schema.description: Reference to the JSON Schema file that defines the structure of this document.

id.description: Unique identifier for the mod (must match its folder name under mods/). Case-insensitive for lookups, but preserved casing stored.

version.description: Semantic version of the mod (SemVer: major.minor.patch[-prerelease][+build]).

name.description: Human-readable display name for the mod.

description.description: Brief summary of what the mod does.

author.description: Author or team that created the mod.

dependencies.description: Mods this mod depends on. Engine validates these during load. If omitted, there are no dependencies.

conflicts.description: IDs of mods that are incompatible with this mod. Engine validates these during load.

gameVersion.description: Game engine version or SemVer range this mod supports (e.g., "^1.2.0", ">=1.0.0 <2.0.0"). If specified (and not null/empty/whitespace), the engine will validate its own version against this range during startup using SemVer rules. If the engine version is outside the specified range, or if the value is not a valid SemVer range string, the engine will refuse to start with a fatal error.

content.description: Mapping of content categories to lists of JSON definition files included in this mod. Relative paths from the mod's root directory.

contentFileList.description: Array of relative paths (using forward slashes '/') to .json definition files for a specific content type. Paths must not start with '/' or contain '..'.

items.description: Relative path to a definition file, e.g., "items/swords/iron_sword.json".

dependency.description: Declares a dependency on another mod.

id.description: ID of the dependency mod. Case-insensitive match.
